ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_SHORT: This platform supports you in learning the teachings of Cheikh Ahmadou Bamba Mbacké.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION_LONG: This platform supports you in learning the teachings of Cheikh Ahmadou Bamba Mbacké. The courses are structured into classes and validated by quizzes to reinforce your knowledge. Each learner has a personal account to track their progress. The cards below present the different categories of books, allowing you to access the works classified by theme.
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: MouridXam is a platform dedicated to the dissemination of the teachings of Cheikh Ahmadou Bamba Mbacké, aiming to make his writings accessible to all Muslims. Our mission is to create an interactive and structured learning experience for everyone, regardless of their level of knowledge or geographical location.
